import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="https://api.themoviedb.org/3";var apiKey="5f1d3356a034d160b3fe113dc6bcc6cc";// <--- Ваш api ключ сюди
export function fetchTrendingMovies(){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/trending/movie/day?api_key=").concat(apiKey));}export function fetchMoviesByQuery(query){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/search/movie?api_key=").concat(apiKey,"&query=").concat(query));}export function fetchMovieDetails(movieId){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/movie/").concat(movieId,"?api_key=").concat(apiKey));}export function fetchMovieActors(movieId){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/movie/").concat(movieId,"/credits?api_key=").concat(apiKey));}export function fetchMovieReviews(movieId){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/movie/").concat(movieId,"/reviews?api_key=").concat(apiKey));}
